attributes.action: Make it illegal for any M.P. to be made Prime Minister without a vote by the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister Gordon Brown has been ensconsed in office without recourse to a vote by the people. This petition is to ensure it is illegal for anyone to govern Britain without a vote by the people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
